column4: Hello guysI am having a crazy problem. As soon as I installed Ubuntu on my laptop keyboard got messed up and i cant use it well, even on Windows or BIOS setup.
I dont know what to do ;s
that's like "I bought a new washing machine and my tv doesnt work"
the keyboard doesnt work properly @ bios aswell ?
it does whole words with a key press ?
something like "fn" key holded all the time ?
and it started to happen right after ?
attach external keyboard and check if its same
have you reset bios to defaults or not?
okay, then what is causing the issue...
just a suggestion - contact ubuntu support and ask them for known issues of the laptop + ubuntu
I have such problem when I clean my touch keys ;)
took away some keys and inserted again, no luck :/
